assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Cyient Limited provides geospatial, engineering design, information technology (IT) solutions, and data analytic services in North America, Europe, and the Asia Pacific. The company operates in Services; and Design Led Manufacturing segments. It offers engineering services, such as mechanical engineering, plant engineering, aftermarket, manufacturing engineering, embedded software and electronic, engineering application software development, electrical engineering, semiconductor design services, and intellectual property and allied services. The company also provides electronic and mechanical manufacturing services; analytics, big data consulting, and Internet of Things and M2M services; and network and operation services comprising data management, IT, network engineering and operation, utility system, IT service management, and SD wide area network services. In addition, it offers geospatial services, including acquisition, remote sensing, photogrammetry, navigational data mapping, navigational database generation, and location-based services. Further, the company provides digitization of drawings and maps, computer aided design/engineering, design and modelling, repair development engineering, reverse engineering application software development, software products development, consulting, analytics, and implementation services. It serves aerospace and defense, communications, rail transportation, medical technology and healthcare, utilities, navigation, heavy equipment and industrial, power generation, oil and gas, semiconductor, infrastructure, and mining industries. Cyient Limited has a strategic partnership with Space Research and Innovation Network for Technology to enhance the innovation in the UK space sector. The company was formerly known as Infotech Enterprises Limited and changed its name to Cyient Limited in May 2014. Cyient Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hyderabad, India.
